channel.title: Psychopath (Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
Passive - Muscular: Night immune
Passive - Good memory: Get the names of people that occupy your (including Prince)
Day ability - Laugh maniacally: Gives another use of Haste. Invest ability's that check for faction will get your exact role instead. - 0 (gains one for every 2 kills with stab)
Night ability 1 - stab: Kill your target - infinite
Night ability 2 - Haste: Kill 2 targets - 1 use
For the record the average KPN of this class is 1.33. That is excellent but not fundamentally broken for an NK. He has no way to deal with Night immune targets. Has no means to tamper with information and the main invest roles can find him. Plus he isn't RB immune. If anything the role is UP but NK's tend to be. If you have any suggestions please let me know

item.title: Psychopath (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

Idk think he should get the prince’s name. He could just claim something random with Prince and then stab them the next name

I can see your point, I was thinking it might be over powered.

It would make prince more trigger happy. Keep in mind it would make priest more valuable.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: RopeStringFace
item.description:
Ami:

Why Rope? I gave my idea for haste and I think it could use some tweaking around the edges still. That’s my job done imo, its up to everyone else how to tweak it

I currently think it is to bland and not good enough.

Doing this gives it a bit of flavor

item.description:
It doesn’t. I just Said that it did in Tos. This is not ToS so it won’t be like that. But the high KPN should make up for lack of other abilities.

item.title: Psychopath (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Ami
item.description:

item.title: Psychopath (Neutral Killing)

item.description:
Thats was the idea. The reason the Sk was the best NK is ToS was because it had the best KPN. This role has the same idea but without a way to deal with occupation.
